util change log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

This project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

0.11.1

  • Fix an infinite loop in util.deprecate some build configurations. ([@bernardmcmanus](https://github.com/bernardmcmanus) in #12)

0.11.0

  • Add util.promisify.
  • Add util.callbackify.

0.10.4

  • Update inherits dependency.
